scripts.frontend_run_prod: cd front_end && yarn build && yarn start
scripts.api_run_docker: cd back_end && docker build -t q2a-api . &&  docker run -d --name q2a-api-demo --network mysqlnetwork -p 4000:4000  q2a-api
scripts.frontend_run_docker: cd front_end && docker build -t q2a-ui . &&  docker run -d --name q2a-ui-demo --network mysqlnetwork -p 3000:3000  q2a-ui
